tool_description: Get the geographic Information of a particular IP address of requested resource
name: Geographical Info By IP address
title: Geographical Info By IP address

api_list.name: Get Geolocation info
api_list.description: get the info related to ip address

required_parameters.name: ip-address
required_parameters.description: always add .json after your ip address

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geographical-info-by-ip-address.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ip/geo/8.8.8.8.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geographical-info-by-ip-address.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geographical-info-by-ip-address.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ip/geo/{ip_address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geographical-info-by-ip-address.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
